message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.MA 

This paper deals with the use of abstraction in ASP programs, which is a topic closely related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and logic (cs.LO). The application of this method to the problem of defining declarative policies for reactive agents and reasoning about them suggests a connection to software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the use of abstraction to reduce the size of the problem is a technique that can be applied to many areas of computer science, including mathematical optimization (cs.MA).
